game.name: AIKAGI After Days
game.shortDescription: AIKAGI After Days is a visual novel which depicts a young couple enjoying their college life together. If you enjoyed their blossoming love story in AIKAGI, you will love this summer full of dates, swimming, fireworks, travel... and maybe just some studying.
game.shortDescriptionEn: AIKAGI After Days is a visual novel which depicts a young couple enjoying their college life together. If you enjoyed their blossoming love story in AIKAGI, you will love this summer full of dates, swimming, fireworks, travel... and maybe just some studying.

reviewHighlights.text: This is a sequel to the wholesome romance eroge with the same name. If you like the first one, definitely get this one as well for more diabetes conte...
Fandisk/expansion for AIKAGI. Continues the story of the romance between two childhood friends. Kinetic novel. Decent.
